notes.text:
This update for exempi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-18652: Fixed buffer overflow vulnerability in WEBP_Support.cpp (bsc#1214488).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in WEBP_Support.cpp in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted webp file.
notes.title: CVE description
